column1: Baby Barnaby's////We called over a server and he snatched it out of his hand as I was literally trying to take a picture of it. We looked at the server confused as hell as to why he would be so aggressive then asked is that a bug. This server looked at it for 5 seconds and said with the a cheerful-fake voice
column3: would you like another order?" When we said no
column5: "Okay I'll get it out of your way". Then rushed into another server and now two were staring at us.
